mapper.select: SELECT POSITION_ID, NAME, LINE_ID, LINE_NAME, PROCESS_CODE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, light_worktime_rate, light_division_flg FROM V_POSITION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
SELECT POSITION_ID, NAME, LINE_ID, LINE_NAME, PROCESS_CODE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_POSITION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 ORDER BY PROCESS_CODE;
SELECT P.POSITION_ID, P.NAME, P.PROCESS_CODE FROM POSITION P JOIN LINE L ON L.LINE_ID = P.LINE_ID WHERE P.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.INLINE_FLG = 1 ORDER BY P.PROCESS_CODE;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSITION (NAME, LINE_ID, PROCESS_CODE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME,light_worktime_rate,light_division_flg) VALUES (#{name}, #{line_id}, #{process_code}, #{updated_by}, current_timestamp,#{light_worktime_rate},#{light_division_flg});
mapper.update: UPDATE POSITION SET NAME = #{name}, LINE_ID = #{line_id}, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp, light_worktime_rate = #{light_worktime_rate}, light_division_flg = #{light_division_flg} WHERE POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
UPDATE POSITION SET DELETE_FLG = 1, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
mapper.select: SELECT POSITION_ID FROM POSITION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND light_division_flg = 1;
